reviews.review: El juego es bueno, pero algunas personas de la comunidad son un poco tóxicas y en ocasiones hacen que no se disfrute tanto el juego, además de que es un poco complicado mejorar
this game is for white people
iyi bir hile koruması gelirse mükemmel olucağını düşünüyorum
bah c'est counter strike quoi mdr

This game is recommended to all of those players who like playing online and with friends. I don't recommand to download the game for free, because you can't play ranked competitive just unranked (and wingman the same). There are some problems however, for example cheaters (you meet a lot of cheaters and after a week or two, you start reporting the good players from the enemy team, because you think that they are cheaters). Over all the game is still fun to play.
